data.title: ‚ÄòAn Absolute Miracle‚Äô: Hulk Hogan, Dubbed ‚ÄòReal-Life Superhero‚Äô For Rescuing Teen From Flipped Car, Thanks the Lord for Positive Outcome
data.meta_description: Famed wrestler Hulk Hogan has been in the headlines of late for getting baptized and speaking about his newfound Christian faith.
data.text:
Famed wrestler Hulk Hogan has recently been in the headlines for getting baptized and speaking about his newfound Christian faith.

Listen to them on the latest episode of ‚ÄúQuick Start‚Äù üëá

But the former WWE star is now making headlines for ‚Äúplaying real-life superheroes‚Äù alongside one of his friends. According to entertainment site TMZ, Hogan was in Tampa Sunday night when he witnessed a horrific crash and jumped into action.

The accident reportedly involved a 17-year-old girl, whom Hogan reportedly rescued.

After news of the incident broke, the wrestling icon‚Äôs wife, Sky Daily Hogan, shared details of the event on her Facebook page.

‚ÄúLast night, after we left dinner in Tampa, we saw a car flip in front of us!‚Äù she wrote. ‚ÄúI truly admire my husband @hulkhogan and our good buddy @jakerask for springing into action, puncturing the girl‚Äôs airbag, and getting her quickly out of the car.‚Äù

According to Hogan, the victim was ‚Äúunscathed,‚Äù though rattled. In the end, she called the entire ordeal ‚Äúan absolute miracle.‚Äù

The wrestler also confirmed the story on his Twitter feed, explaining how he was able to pop the airbag without a knife.

‚ÄúThe crazy part about the teenager that flipped her car was that, without a knife to puncture the airbags to get her out, a[n] Indian Rocks Christian ballpoint pen came in really handy,‚Äù he wrote on X.

Hogan continued, ‚ÄúThank you, God, all is well.‚Äù
